DOC.brief_summary: The specific aim study determine efficacy cost-effectiveness weight loss program compare usual care ( control ) treatment 6-month change body weight , body fat , serum hormone breast cancer survivor .
DOC.detailed_description: Proposed three-arm randomized control trial 6-months weight loss counseling ( i.e. , dietary-induced caloric restriction physical activity ) clinically meaningful endpoint 100 breast cancer survivor . The three arm : 1 . In-person counseling , 2 . Telephone-based counseling , 3 . Usual care . Women randomize one 3 study arm use random permute block design . Research staff collect body composition data , well review form enter data , blind participant 's study group .
DOC.criteria: American Joint Committee Cancer ( AJCC ) Stages 0IIIC Breast Cancer BMI > 25 kg/m2 Completed surgery , chemotherapy radiation least 2 month ago Physically able exercise Agrees randomly assign either weight loss control Gives inform consent participate study activity Able come baseline 6month clinic visit Mentally competent
